summary: EVERY TIME I FILL UP MY VEHICLE AT A GAS STATION GAS COMES POURING OUT AFTER THE TANK IS FULL. THE GAS NOZZLE CLICKS OFF AND GAS BEGINS TO POUR OUT ALL OVER THE SIDE OF THE VEHICLE AND THE GROUND. I HAVE TRIED MANUALLY PUMPING AS WELL AS AUTOMATICALLY PUMPING WITH THE SAME RESULTS. I HAVE ATTEMPTED FILLING AT MULTIPLE GAS STATIONS WITH THE SAME OUTCOME.  THIS DID NOT OCCUR THE FIRST YEAR THAT I OWNED MY CAR, AND ONLY BEGAN IN THE PAST COUPLE MONTHS. THIS IS A HAZARD TO THE ENVIRONMENT AND A POTENTIAL DANGER FOR A FIRE. *TR
